Articles.Content: KSP is becoming a great game and i do like how it looks currently however i believe that a beutiful game is a good game I would like to see clouds on planets suck as eve and kerbin planets with an atmosphere that would make the game a bit more graphically better also clouds are pretty thick thicker than air in which could be something to mess you up and possible on eve because the atmosphere is thick clouds could be even worse there.
Clouds and weather are planned, but it's probably going to be a long way off yet. There's bigger things they need to get done first, like career mode.

Please refer to http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/36863-What-not-to-suggest before making suggestions.

Clouds and other weather-related phenomena are planned but low priority, as they are a purely cosmetic feature while areas of the game still need much more in-depth attention.
